---
title: "Articles Listing Card"
listing:
    id: articles
    contents:
        - "../*.qmd"
        - "../javase/*.qmd"
        -  "../linux/*.qmd"
        - "../markup/*.qmd"
        - "../vocabulary/*.qmd"
        - "../scrum/*.qmd"
        - "../spring/*.qmd"
        - "../springboot*.qmd" 
    sort:
        - "file-modified desc"
        - "categories"
    type: default
    image-align: left
    image-placeholder: "/images/home/frontimagealbertprofeweb.png"
    fields: [image, categories, title, description, reading-time, date, author, file-modified]
    table-hover: true
    date-format: full
    categories: true
